doc:
Michael Jace https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Michael_Jace 0 Michael Andrew Jace (born July 13, 1962) is a former American actor, best known for his role as Los Angeles Police Officer Julien Lowe in the FX drama The Shield. He played Andre Tibbs, ex-convict mover accused of murder, on an episode of Cold Case. On May 20, 2014, Jace was arrested after he fatally shot his wife, April Jace. A jury subsequently convicted him of second-degree murder on May 31, 2016, and on June 10, 2016 sentenced him to forty years to life in prison. Michael_Andrew_Jace ( born July_13_,_1962 ) is a_former_American_actor , best_known for his_role as Los_Angeles_Police_Officer_Julien_Lowe in the_FX_drama The_Shield . He played Andre_Tibbs , ex-convict_mover accused of murder , on an_episode of Cold_Case . On May_20_,_2014 , Jace was_arrested after he fatally shot his_wife , April_Jace . A_jury subsequently convicted him of second-degree_murder on May_31_,_2016 , and on June_10_,_2016 sentenced him to forty_years to life in prison .
